content: If you delete this application, all active consents and authorization will be revoked. If a user tries to open the consent screen for this app, an error will occur in the document space and the user will be redirected to the specified redirect URL.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when deleting an application on OAuth consent screen. It informs users that revoking active consents will occur and may cause errors or redirects if they try to access the app again. The text appears in a modal dialog as part of the "Delete Application" button.

usage.context:
<ModalDialog.Header>
 {isGroup ? t("DeleteApplications") : t("DeleteApplication")}
 </ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 {isGroup ? (
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="DeleteApplicationsDescription" ns="OAuth" />
 ) : (
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="DeleteApplicationDescription" ns="OAuth" />
 )}
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'applications' (تطبيقات) is singular in the English content but plural in the Arabic translation. The context refers to one application, not multiple.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إذا قمت بحذف هذا التطبيق، فسيتم إلغاء جميع الأذونات النشطة والمصادقة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'authorization' (المصادقة) is a broad term and might need more specific translation depending on the intended meaning. While technically correct, it could be more precise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'تصاريح' (tasareeh - permissions) or 'توثيق' (tawtheeq - authentication) depending on the intended nuance. For example: 'إذا قمت بحذف هذا التطبيق، فسيتم إلغاء جميع الأذونات النشطة والتصاريح.' or 'إذا قمت بحذف هذا التطبيق، فسيتم إلغاء جميع الأذونات النشطة والتوثيق.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'səlahiyyətlər' (authority) doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'authorization' in this context. A more accurate translation would be something like 'rüxsət' or 'imtiyaz'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu tətbiqləri silsəniz, bütün aktiv icazə və rüxsətlər ləğv ediləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sənəd' should be 'sənəd sahəsində', or 'dokуment sahəsində' for clarity and consistency with the English term 'document space'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu tətbiqləri silsəniz, bütün aktiv icazə və səlahiyyətlər ləğv ediləcək. Əgər istifadəçi bu tətbiqin icazə ekranını açmağa çalışarsa, sənəd sahəsində xəta baş verəcək və istifadəçi göstərilən yönləndirmə URL-inə yönləndiriləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text refers to 'this application' (singular), while the Bulgarian translation uses 'тези приложения' (these applications - plural). This suggests a possible misunderstanding or a broad interpretation of the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising the Bulgarian translation to use the singular form 'това приложение' to match the English 'this application'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrasing 'в пространството на документа' (in the document space) might be overly technical and less natural for a user-facing message. It might be beneficial to simplify.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing 'в пространството на документа' to something more user-friendly, such as 'в системата' or 'в приложението'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'tyto aplikace' is used when referring to 'this application'. It implies multiple applications. The original English refers to a single application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokud tuto aplikaci odstraníte...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content refers to 'application' (singular). The German translation uses 'Anwendungen' (plural). While technically not incorrect, it doesn't perfectly match the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wenn Sie diese Anwendung löschen...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'this application' is translated as 'αυτές τις εφαρμογές' (these applications). The original refers to a single application, not multiple applications. The translation should reflect the singular.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν διαγράψετε αυτήν την εφαρμογή,

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English uses 'this application' while the Spanish uses 'estas aplicaciones' (these applications). This implies the deletion of multiple applications, not just one. The translation should reflect 'esta aplicación' (this application) to align with the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Si elimina esta aplicación, se revocarán todos los consentimientos y autorizaciones activos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'this application' is translated as 'nämä sovellukset' (these applications). The context refers to a single application, not multiple. Using 'tämä sovellus' (this application) would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos poistat *tämän sovelluksen*, kaikki aktiiviset suostumukset ja valtuutukset peruutetaan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'document space' is translated as 'asiakirjatilassa'. While understandable, a more natural Finnish phrasing would better reflect the technical context. A possible alternative would be something like 'hallinnollisessa tilassa' or 'järjestelmässä'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos käyttäjä yrittää avata tämän sovelluksen suostumusnäyttöä, *hallinnollisessa tilassa* tapahtuu virhe...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text uses "this application" while the French translation uses "cette application." This implies a single application is being deleted, whereas the English suggests a potentially multiple applications.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising the French to align with the English nuance. For example, 'Si vous supprimez ces applications...' is appropriate if multiple applications are possible. If only one application is intended, 'Si vous supprimez cette application...' is fine.  The ambiguity should be resolved to ensure the translation is clear and accurate to the original intent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation uses a comma after "applications" in the first sentence, which isn't stylistically consistent with other comma usage. While not grammatically incorrect, it looks slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the comma after 'applications' in the first sentence: 'Si vous supprimez ces applications...'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "If you delete this application" is translated as "Եթե ջնջեք այս հավելվածները" (If you delete these applications). It should be singular, reflecting the original sentence’s reference to a single application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Եթե ջնջեք այս հավելվածը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "consent screen" is translated as "համաձայնության ձևը". While technically correct, a more natural Armenian phrasing might be beneficial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: համաձայնության էկրանը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "authorization" is translated as "承認 (shōnin)" which is more accurately 'approval' rather than 'authorization'. Authorization implies a broader granting of access, whereas approval is a more specific agreement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "認可 (nin-ka)" for 'authorization'. This is the standard term in Japanese for granting permissions or authority.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better readability in Japanese. A more natural flow could be achieved by reordering the clauses.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence to: 'これらのアプリケーションを削除すると、すべてのアクティブな同意は取り消され、認可も無効になります。ユーザーがこのアプリケーションの同意画面を開こうとすると、ドキュメントスペースでエラーが発生し、指定のリダイレクトURLにリダイレクトされます。'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "유효한 모든 동의" could be more accurately translated as "모든 활성 동의" to align with the English "all active consents." "유효한" implies validity, whereas "활성" directly refers to the consent being currently in use.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 모든 활성 동의

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "동의 화면을 열려고 시도할 경우" is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it could be more natural to use a more direct phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 앱의 동의 화면을 열려고 시도할 경우

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'document space' is awkward in Lao. It lacks a direct equivalent and the phrasing 'ເຂດແຖວເອກະສານ' doesn't convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'ພື້ນທີ່ຂໍ້ມູນ' or 'ສະຖານທີ່ສື່' depending on the precise technical meaning intended.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຖືກນຳທາງໄປຫາ URL ນຳທາງທີ່ລະບຸໄວ້' is a literal translation of 'redirected to the specified redirect URL' and sounds unnatural in Lao. The concept of a 'redirect URL' might not be readily understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase to something like 'ຖືກນຳທາງໄປຫາທີ່ຢູ່ເວັບໄຊ້ທີ່ກຳນົດໄວ້' or 'ຖືກນຳທາງໄປຫາເວັບໄຊ້ຕາມທີ່ລະບຸໄວ້'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'lietojumprogrammas' is repeated. Using the shorter form 'lietotnes' after the first instance would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ja izdzēsīsiet šīs lietotnes, visas aktīvās piekrišanas un autorizācija tiks atsauktas. Ja lietotājs mēģinās atvērt šīs lietotnes piekrišanas ekrānu, dokumentu telpā radīsies kļūda un lietotājs tiks novirzīts uz norādīto novirzīšanas vietrādi URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “novirzīšanas vietrādi URL” is a literal translation of “redirect URL.” While technically correct, a more natural and idiomatic translation for a Latvian audience would be 'pārvirzīšanas URL'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ja izdzēsīsiet šīs lietotnes, visas aktīvās piekrišanas un autorizācija tiks atsauktas. Ja lietotājs mēģinās atvērt šīs lietotnes piekrišanas ekrānu, dokumentu telpā radīsies kļūda un lietotājs tiks novirzīts uz norādīto pārvirzīšanas URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses the plural 'aplikacje' (applications) while the English refers to 'this application' (singular). While technically correct, it may cause confusion. A more direct translation would use the singular.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jeśli usuniesz tę aplikację, wszystkie aktywne zgody i autoryzacja zostaną cofnięte.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'obszarze roboczym dokumentu' (document workspace) is slightly awkward. While accurate, a more natural phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jeśli użytkownik spróbuje otworzyć ekran zgody dla tej aplikacji, wystąpi błąd.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'this application' is translated as 'estes aplicativos'. It should be 'este aplicativo' to match the singular 'this application' in the English content. The plural form suggests multiple applications are being deleted, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se você excluir este aplicativo...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English uses 'this application' while the Portuguese uses 'esses aplicativos' (these applications).  It implies multiple applications are being deleted, which isn't the original intent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se você excluir este aplicativo, todos os consentimentos e autorizações ativos serão revogados.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "active consents and authorization" is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it could be improved for readability in Romanian. 'Consimțământele și autorizațiile active' is grammatically correct, but a more natural phrasing could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dacă ștergeți aceste aplicații, toate consimțământele active și autorizațiile vor fi revocate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation uses a semicolon (`;`) between sentences which is unusual in modern Romanian. While not incorrect, a period (`.`) would be more typical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dacă ștergeți aceste aplicații, toate consimțământele active și autorizațiile vor fi revocate. Dacă utilizatorul încearcă să acceseze pagina de consimţământ pentru această aplicație, va apărea o eroare în spațiul documente, iar utilizatorul va fi redirecționat către URL-ul de redirecționare specificat.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "OAuth:DeleteApplicationsDescription" suggests a technical context. The translation "මෙම යෙදුම ඔබ මකලොත්" (If you delete this application) is correct, but the overall phrasing lacks the precision expected in a technical description. It could be more formal and direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම යෙදුම ඉවත් කිරීමෙන්, සියලු ක්‍රියාකාරී අනුමැතීම් හා අවසර අවලංගු කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “ලේඛන අවකාශයේ දෝෂයක් පැනනැගී” - The literal translation is 'an error will occur in the document space.' This phrase might not be understandable to a general Sinhala-speaking audience, especially in a user-facing application. It would be more user-friendly to explain the consequence in simpler terms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: එකොළොස් වැරැද්දක් සිදු වී, පරිශීලකයා නැවත හරවන URL වෙත යොමු කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “නවතා හරවන URL” - While technically correct, “redirect URL” is better translated as “ප්‍රති-යෝජන URL” (prathi-yojana URL). It's a more standard term used in Sinhala for redirects.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නවතා හරවන URL බවට පරිශීලකයා යොමු කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "tieto aplikácie" (these applications) is overly broad. The English refers to *this* application, singular. The translation should reflect the singular nature.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ak túto aplikáciu vymažete...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "hlásenie o chybe" is a literal translation of "error message" but sounds unnatural in Slovak. A more natural phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: v priestore pre dokumenty sa zobrazí chyba

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'URL adresu zadanú na presmerovanie' is grammatically correct but could be more concise.  While technically accurate, it isn't the most elegant phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: na zadanú presmerovacie URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Če izbrišete te aplikacije" uses the informal 'izbrišete' (you delete). For a more formal context, like an OAuth description, 'Če izbrišete to aplikacijo' (If you delete this application) or 'Če uporabnik izbriše to aplikacijo' (If the user deletes this application) would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Če izbrišete to aplikacijo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English 'document space' doesn't have a direct equivalent. 'Dokumentni prostor' is a literal translation, but might be confusing.  A clearer translation would focus on the impact.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: bo prišlo do napake

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'апликације' (applications) is repeated unnecessarily. It appears once in the first sentence and again in the second.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the second sentence to avoid repetition. For example: 'Ако корисник покуша да отвори екран пристанка за њу, доћи ће до грешке...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'redirect URL' is translated as 'URL за преусмеравање'. While technically correct, a more natural and concise translation might be 'адреса за преусмеравање'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'URL за преусмеравање' with 'адреса за преусмеравање'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ako obrišete ove aplikacije" is grammatically correct but slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "Ako obrišete ovu aplikaciju" or "Ako obrišete aplikaciju". The English uses 'this application', implying a singular application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ako obrišete ovu aplikaciju

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English uses 'consent screen'. The translation uses 'ekran pristanka', which is acceptable, but might benefit from a more precise term if a specific UI element is being referenced.  'Prozor pristanka' or similar might be more accurate, depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ako korisnik pokuša da otvori prozor pristanka za ovu aplikaciju

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'navedeni URL za preusmeravanje' is technically correct but a little stiff. A more common and easily understood phrasing would be 'URL za preusmeravanje'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL za preusmeravanje

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrasing "If you delete this application" is translated as "Bu uygulamaları silerseniz" which implies multiple applications are being deleted. The key refers to a single application. The translation should reflect this singular context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu uygulamayı silerseniz

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content uses sentence capitalization. The Turkish translation does not consistently follow this pattern.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu uygulamayı silerseniz, tüm etkin izinler ve yetkilendirmeler iptal edilir. Bir kullanıcı bu uygulama için izin ekranını açmaya çalışırsa, belge alanında bir hata oluşur ve kullanıcı belirtilen yönlendirme URL’sine yönlendirilir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'application' is translated as 'застосунки' which is plural. The original refers to a single application. The pluralization may not be accurate in context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Якщо ви видалите цей застосунок...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'в просторі документів' (in the document space) could be clearer. A simpler alternative might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: в системі

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "đồng ý cho màn hình" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey "consent screen". It's a literal translation and not idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: đồng ý hiển thị

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “không gian tài liệu” isn't the most natural translation for “document space” in this context. It's quite technical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: nền tảng

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the sentence structure 'Nếu người dùng cố gắng mở đồng ý cho màn hình cho ứng dụng này' is a bit clunky. Combining 'màn hình cho ứng dụng này' isn't ideal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu người dùng cố gắng mở màn hình đồng ý cho ứng dụng này

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'this application' is translated as '这些应用程序 (these applications)'. It's likely referring to a single application, not multiple. The correct translation should reflect the singular nature.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 此应用 (this application)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'consent screen' is translated as '同意界面'. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing in Chinese might be '授权页面' or '同意授权页面'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 授权页面
